info.title:
Create badges online
quickly and easily!
info.description: Generate custom badges for events and organize your events effortlessly.

csv.title: Caricamento Rapido CSV
csv.description: Semplifica il processo di generazione badge importando facilmente un file CSV con di dati dei partecipanti

real-time.title: Anteprima in Tempo Reale
real-time.description: Visualizza istantaneamente l'aspetto del badge durante la personalizzazione, garantendo risultati perfetti.

templates.title: Modelli Predefiniti Professionali
templates.description: Inizia rapidamente con modelli di badge predefiniti, personalizzabili per adattarsi alle tue esigenze

updates.title: Aggiornamenti costanti
updates.description: Continua a beneficiare di nuove funzionalità e miglioramenti grazie agli aggiornamenti regolari del sistema

design.title: No competenze di grafica richieste
design.description: Non sono necessarie competenze di design per creare splendidi badge

download.title: Scarica gratuitamente
download.description: Badge Master è stato progettato per creare e scaricare gratuitamente badge

step1.title: Choose the template
step1.description:
There are several free templates to choose from for designing your custom badge. Choose the template that best suits your event or customize it completely to fit your needs. 
Tip: The texts on the badges are placeholders. They can be changed according to your use case. Choose a template you like and proceed to customize your certificates!

step2.title: Add participants
step2.description:
Insert your CSV file containing the data, and the program will automatically populate the template with all the necessary information. In a few steps, you will get your personalized badges with the desired fields. 
Tip: For optimal results, upload your CSV file with the data ensuring that each piece of information is accurately placed in their respective columns, such as name column, surname...

step3.title: Enter your email
step3.description: You're almost done! Now enter your email and you will receive your badges within minutes.

step4.title: Download the badges
step4.description: To complete the process, click on 'Download Badge'. You will receive your badges directly in your email inbox. Thank you for using our service!

badgeTemplate.title: Create your own badges
badgeTemplate.minCharactersError: Participant name must be at least 5 characters long.
badgeTemplate.mailInstruction:
After entering your email, you will receive a ZIP file containing all the badges created.
 Remember to check your spam folder!
